mapper.select: select * from mb_event_attr where EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COLUMN_STATUS !='W' order by assemble_type ,seq_no+0
select * from mb_event_attr where EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COLUMN_STATUS !='W'
mapper.insert:
insert into mb_event_attr
EVENT_TYPE,
SEQ_NO,
ASSEMBLE_TYPE,
ASSEMBLE_ID,
ATTR_VALUE,
ASSEMBLE_RULE,
COMPANY,

mapper.select: select * from mb_event_attr where EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COLUMN_STATUS!='N' order by ASSEMBLE_TYPE
select * from mb_event_attr where EVENT_TYPE = #{eventType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and COLUMN_STATUS!='Y' order by ASSEMBLE_TYPE
